name: Vegan Tomato, Cucumber, and Lentil Salad
author: yumnjam
summary: This is one of my favorite fresh summer salads. The lentils add a nice smoky flavor to the spicy onion, basil, and sweet balsamic vinegar. This is delicious served hot or cold and is a very satisfying vegan main dish.
ingredients: 1  English cucumber, peeled and cut into bite-size pieces
½ cup finely chopped fresh basil
directions: Combine water and lentils in a large pot
Bring to a boil; reduce heat and simmer gently until lentils are tender but not mushy, about 20 minutes
Drain excess liquid and transfer to a large bowl
Stir cucumber, tomatoes, red onion, and basil into lentils
